summary: Diff implements most requested interactivity: scroll-triggered entrance animations via MotionSection/useInViewOnce, SPA page transition animation in App, interactive Home service card details dialog with CTAs that pre-select service type, Quote/Booking inline validation + on-page mutation error banners, and Tracking enhancements (copy control, expandable entries, skeleton loader). One notable gap is comprehensive required-field validation/feedback on Quote and Booking beyond the weight/date checks shown in the diff excerpt.

missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows only a weight > 0 validation path; no evidence in the provided excerpt of required-field validation/inline errors for the many other fields (addresses, item type, etc.).

missing_requirements.requirement: Booking page shows inline validation feedback before submission and required fields are clearly indicated (beyond just weight and pickup date).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows real-time validation only for weight and pickup date; no evidence in the provided excerpt of required-field validation/inline errors for customer/address/shipment fields.
